name: Meowstronaut
description:
Be a cat racing down to earth! Collect food to gain points. The faster you go, the more points you earn! But be careful! Don't crash!

Controls:
WASD to control your cat. That's it. Easy, right?

The difficulty slider is just there to troll, anything but the middle will make it harder for you.

Sadly, we don't have a pause menu but Alt-F4 will serve you well.

We created this game with a team of five people for the Epic Megajam 2019. None of us had a lot of time but we wanted to participate.

Absolutely no assets were created before the jam. It was all created from scratch (except for the Unreal Twin Stick preset we heavily modified).
